Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.Handler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Handler is a class used for updating and storing GameObjects
    Author:
    Maks Turtiainen
    See Also:
